ld r2, b(r0)              -> 11011100000000100000000000000000 (0xDC020000)
daddiu r3, r0, 2          -> 01100100000000110000000000000010 (0x64030002)
sd r1, INIT_DECL(r0)      -> 11111100000000010000000000000000 (0xFC010000)
daddiu r2, r0, 2          -> 01100100000000100000000000000010 (0x64020002)
sd r2, b(r0)              -> 11111100000000100000000000000000 (0xFC020000)
